price: Ubu bwami buhambaye n’iyoroherezwa ryo kwikora ku muyaga no ku mashetani, ni impano yacu kuri wewe Sulayimani, uratanga utitangira, uhe uwo ushatse, wime uwo ushatse, nta wuzoguciramwo.
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

meta.transliteration: hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
